metadata.title: CVE-2022-28188 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where theproduct receives input or data, but does not validate or incorrectlyvalidates that the input has the properties that are required to processthe data safely and correctly, which may lead to denial of service.
